description: The trip to Threepoint Canyon is a must to see and offers unique views not typical of the area.  Can be combined with a loop around Wild Horse or an in and out on Quirk Creek.
directions: Park at the signposted Cobble Flats picnic area off Highway 66 SW of Bragg Creek. Find a suitable place to ford the Elbow River, and turn left.  Follow the road about 2.2km and turn right (to the SE) up Quirk Creek.  Up about 11km staying to the right-ish (but stay left at the Wildhorse shortcut 6km up)
title: Threepoint Canyon & Creek (Wild Horse & Quirk)
